title: Can Remco Evenepoel Take Tour de France Second Place and Stun Vingegaard?
content:
'The legs that will do the talking': Evenepoel predicts Alps fireworks as team insiders give insight into the mature, 'real leader' who loves to race on display at this Tour.

Read the full article at Can Remco Evenepoel Take Tour de France Second Place and Stun Vingegaard? on Velo.
author: Andy McGrath
